s1.text: Which input voltage is the JXi configured for?

s1a.text: Measure power at Distribution Board between Black (C) and Red (B). Expected: 110–126 VAC.

s1b.text: Measure power at Dist. Board between Black (C) and Red (B). Expected: 220–252 VAC.

fix_pump.text: Correct filter pump wiring/power. Then retest.

s2.text: Measure Transformer: 24 VAC between Red (2) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

s3.text: Measure Fuse: 24 VAC at Red (2) & Yellow (1) on PIB. Expected: 22–26 VAC.

fix_short.text: Locate/repair short circuit and replace fuse.

s4.text: Measure Water Pressure Switch: 24 VAC between Purple (4) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

recheck_red3.text: Recheck Red (3). If 24 VAC there, replace PIB.

s5.text: Measure Pressure Switch: 24 VAC between Gray (5) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

ps_replace.text: If pressure > 2 PSI, replace Pressure Switch; else fix filter/flow.

s6.text: Measure Fusible Link: 24 VAC between Orange (6) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

recheck_gray5.text: Recheck Gray (5). If 24 VAC there, replace PIB.

s7.text: Measure Fusible Link: 24 VAC between Blue (7) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

check_vent_limit.text: Check Vent Limit and replace failed part if necessary.

s8.text: Measure High Limits: 24 VAC between Black (8) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

recheck_blue7.text: If 24 VAC at Blue (7) but not Black (8), replace PIB.

s9.text: Recheck High Limits: Still 24 VAC at Black (8) & Yellow (1)?

replace_high_limits.text: Replace High Limits and perform Temp Rise Test.

s10.text: Measure Power to Ignition Control: 24 VAC between Black/Yellow (10) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

replace_pib10.text: Recheck at Black/Yellow. If absent, replace PIB.

s11.text: Measure Power at Ignition Control: 24 VAC between Black/Yellow (11) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

blower_branch.text: Measure at Ignition Control F1 → Ground. Expected VAC ≥105.

rep_ign_ctrl.text: Replace Ignition Control (VAC adequate but blower off).

s13.text: Measure Air Pressure Switch: 24 VAC between Orange (12) and Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

aps_check.text: Check blower seal/tubing/kinks; replace Air Pressure Switch if needed.

s14.text: Measure Power to PSW at Ignition Control: 24 VAC at Orange (12) & Yellow (1). Expected: 22–26 VAC.

s15.text: After blower ~15s, does the Hot Surface Igniter glow?

measure_KI.text: Measure voltage at K & I on Ignition Control. 105–130 VAC → Replace Igniter. <105 VAC → Replace Ignition Control.

s16.text: After HSI glows, wait ~40s. Do burners ignite?

check_brown13.text: Measure Brown (13) at Ignition Control VAL. Expected: 22–26 VAC.

flame_rectification.text: Heater not recognizing flame (rectification). Check gas pressure, ground, dirty/corroded sensor/igniter, wiring, etc.
